000146  f1000118          ADD      r1,r0,#0x18
00014a  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
00014c  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
000150  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
000152  227f              MOVS     r2,#0x7f
000154  21f8              MOVS     r1,#0xf8
000156  30f4              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xf4
000158  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;847    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->Btn7,  BTN7_X,  BTN7_Y,  BTN_H, BTN_W, "7", &FormPad->FontBtnNum);
00015c  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
00015e  a247              ADR      r2,|L5.636|
000160  f1000118          ADD      r1,r0,#0x18
000164  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
000166  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
00016a  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
00016c  22a9              MOVS     r2,#0xa9
00016e  2168              MOVS     r1,#0x68
000170  f5007086          ADD      r0,r0,#0x10c
000174  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;848    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->Btn8,  BTN8_X,  BTN8_Y,  BTN_H, BTN_W, "8", &FormPad->FontBtnNum);
000178  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
00017a  a241              ADR      r2,|L5.640|
00017c  f1000118          ADD      r1,r0,#0x18
000180  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
000182  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
000186  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
000188  22a9              MOVS     r2,#0xa9
00018a  21b0              MOVS     r1,#0xb0
00018c  f5007092          ADD      r0,r0,#0x124
000190  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;849    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->Btn9,  BTN9_X,  BTN9_Y,  BTN_H, BTN_W, "9", &FormPad->FontBtnNum);
000194  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000196  a23b              ADR      r2,|L5.644|
000198  f1000118          ADD      r1,r0,#0x18
00019c  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
00019e  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
0001a2  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
0001a4  22a9              MOVS     r2,#0xa9
0001a6  21f8              MOVS     r1,#0xf8
0001a8  f500709e          ADD      r0,r0,#0x13c
0001ac  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;850    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->BtnA,  BTNA_X,  BTNA_Y,  BTN_H, BTN_W, ".", &FormPad->FontBtnNum);
0001b0  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0001b2  a235              ADR      r2,|L5.648|
0001b4  f1000118          ADD      r1,r0,#0x18
0001b8  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
0001ba  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
0001be  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
0001c0  22d3              MOVS     r2,#0xd3
0001c2  2168              MOVS     r1,#0x68
0001c4  f50070b6          ADD      r0,r0,#0x16c
0001c8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;851    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->BtnB,  BTNB_X,  BTNB_Y,  BTN_H, BTN_W, "-", &FormPad->FontBtnNum);
0001cc  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0001ce  a22f              ADR      r2,|L5.652|
0001d0  f1000118          ADD      r1,r0,#0x18
0001d4  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
0001d6  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
0001da  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
0001dc  22d3              MOVS     r2,#0xd3
0001de  21f8              MOVS     r1,#0xf8
0001e0  f50070c2          ADD      r0,r0,#0x184
0001e4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;852    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->BtnF1, BTNF1_X, BTNF1_Y, BTN_H, BTN_W, "退格", &FormPad->FontBtn);
0001e8  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0001ea  a229              ADR      r2,|L5.656|
0001ec  f1000110          ADD      r1,r0,#0x10
0001f0  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
0001f2  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
0001f6  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
0001f8  00de              LSLS     r6,r3,#3
0001fa  2255              MOVS     r2,#0x55
0001fc  4631              MOV      r1,r6
0001fe  f50070ce          ADD      r0,r0,#0x19c
000202  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;853    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->BtnF2, BTNF2_X, BTNF2_Y, BTN_H, BTN_W, "清除", &FormPad->FontBtn);
000206  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000208  a223              ADR      r2,|L5.664|
00020a  f1000110          ADD      r1,r0,#0x10
00020e  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
000210  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
000214  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
000216  227f              MOVS     r2,#0x7f
000218  4631              MOV      r1,r6
00021a  f50070da          ADD      r0,r0,#0x1b4
00021e  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;854    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->BtnF3, BTNF3_X, BTNF3_Y, BTN_H, BTN_W, "返回", &FormPad->FontBtn);
000222  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000224  a21e              ADR      r2,|L5.672|
000226  f1000110          ADD      r1,r0,#0x10
00022a  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
00022c  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
000230  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
000232  22a9              MOVS     r2,#0xa9
000234  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000236  f50070e6          ADD      r0,r0,#0x1cc
00023a  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;855    	LCD_InitButton(&FormPad->BtnF4, BTNF4_X, BTNF4_Y, BTN_H, BTN_W, "确认", &FormPad->FontBtn);	
00023e  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000240  a219              ADR      r2,|L5.680|
000242  f1000110          ADD      r1,r0,#0x10
000246  9500              STR      r5,[sp,#0]
000248  e9cd2101          STRD     r2,r1,[sp,#4]
00024c  2328              MOVS     r3,#0x28
00024e  22d3              MOVS     r2,#0xd3
000250  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000252  f50070f2          ADD      r0,r0,#0x1e4
000256  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_InitButton
;;;856    }
00025a  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;857    
                          ENDP

                  |L5.604|
                          DCD      ||.data||
                  |L5.608|
000260  3000              DCB      "0",0
000262  00                DCB      0
000263  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.612|
000264  3100              DCB      "1",0
000266  00                DCB      0
000267  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.616|
000268  3200              DCB      "2",0
00026a  00                DCB      0
00026b  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.620|
00026c  3300              DCB      "3",0
00026e  00                DCB      0
00026f  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.624|
000270  3400              DCB      "4",0
000272  00                DCB      0

                  |L5.628|

                  |L5.632|

                  |L5.636|

                  |L5.640|

000282  00                DCB      0

                  |L5.644|

000286  00                DCB      0
000287  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.648|

00028a  00                DCB      0
00028b  00                DCB      0
                  |L5.652|
00028c  2d00              DCB      "-",0
00028e  00                DCB      0

                  |L5.656|
000290  cdcbb8f1          DCB      205,203,184,241,0
000294  00

                  |L5.664|

00029c  00

                          AREA ||i.InputInt||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  InputInt PROC
;;;273    */
;;;274    uint8_t InputInt(char *_Caption, int32_t _min, int32_t _max, int32_t *_value)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;275    {
000002  b088              SUB      sp,sp,#0x20
000004  461c              MOV      r4,r3
000006  e9cd1204          STRD     r1,r2,[sp,#0x10]
;;;276    	char buf[13];
;;;277    	NUMPAD_INT_T Param;
;;;278    
;;;279    	Param.Min = _min;		/* 最小值 */	
;;;280    	Param.Max = _max;		/* 最大值 */
;;;281    	Param.DotNum = 0;	/* 小数点位数 */
00000a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00000c  f88d1018          STRB     r1,[sp,#0x18]
;;;282    	
;;;283    	if (InputNumber(NUMPAD_INT, _Caption, &Param, (void *)buf))
000010  4601              MOV      r1,r0
000012  466b              MOV      r3,sp
000014  aa04              ADD      r2,sp,#0x10
000016  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000018  f7fffffe          BL       InputNumber
00001c  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00001e  d004              BEQ      |L6.42|
;;;284    	{
;;;285    		*_value = str_to_int(buf);
000020  4668              MOV      r0,sp
000022  f7fffffe          BL       str_to_int
;;;286    		return 1;
000026  6020              STR      r0,[r4,#0]
000028  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
                  |L6.42|
;;;287    	}
;;;288    	else
;;;289    	{
;;;290    		return 0;
;;;291    	}
;;;292    }
00002a  b008              ADD      sp,sp,#0x20
00002c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;293    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.InputNumber||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  InputNumber PROC
;;;316    */
;;;317    uint8_t InputNumber(NUMPAD_MODE_E _Mode, char *_Caption, void *_pInParam, void *_pOutParam)
000000  e92d4fff          PUSH     {r0-r11,lr}
;;;318    {
000004  f5ad7d13          SUB      sp,sp,#0x24c
;;;319    	uint8_t ucTouch;		/* 触摸事件 */
;;;320    	uint8_t fRefresh;		/* 刷屏请求标志,1表示需要刷新 */
;;;321    	int16_t tpX, tpY;
;;;322    	uint8_t ucCursor;	/* 光标 */
;;;323    	uint8_t ucKeyValue = 0xFF;
;;;324    	FormPad_T form;
;;;325    	char cEditBuf[INPUT_MAX_LEN+2];	/* 编辑框内数值 */
;;;326    	uint8_t pad_layer = 0;
;;;327    	uint8_t pad_key = 0;
;;;328    
;;;329    	FormPad = &form;
000008  4dff              LDR      r5,|L7.1032|
00000a  4607              MOV      r7,r0                 ;318
00000c  f04f0b00          MOV      r11,#0                ;326
000010  a80f              ADD      r0,sp,#0x3c
000012  f8cdb244          STR      r11,[sp,#0x244]
;;;330    	
;;;331    	FormPad->pTitle = _Caption;
000016  6028              STR      r0,[r5,#0]  ; FormPad
;;;332    	FormPad->pEditText = cEditBuf;
000018  466e              MOV      r6,sp
00001a  912d              STR      r1,[sp,#0xb4]
00001c  f8cdd238          STR      sp,[sp,#0x238]
;;;333    	
;;;334    	InitFormPad();
000020  f7fffffe          BL       InitFormPad
;;;335    	
;;;336    	/* IP地址 */ /* 电话号码 */ /* 整数（带范围判断） */ /* 任意字母数字 小数点 */
;;;337    	if (_Mode == NUMPAD_IP || _Mode == NUMPAD_TEL || _Mode == NUMPAD_INT)
000024  b12f              CBZ      r7,|L7.50|
000026  2f01              CMP      r7,#1
000028  d003              BEQ      |L7.50|
00002a  2f02              CMP      r7,#2
00002c  d001              BEQ      |L7.50|
;;;338    	{
;;;339    		SetBtnText(PAD_DIGIT);	/* 纯数字键盘 */
;;;340    	}
;;;341    	else
;;;342    	{
;;;343    		SetBtnText(PAD_ABC);	/* T9，数字和字母 */
00002e  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
000030  e000              B        |L7.52|
                  |L7.50|
000032  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;339
                  |L7.52|
000034  f7fffffe          BL       SetBtnText
;;;344    	}	
;;;345    	
;;;346    	DispFormPad();
000038  f7fffffe          BL       DispFormPad
;;;347    	
;;;348    	ucCursor = 0;
00003c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;349    	cEditBuf[0] = 0;
00003e  46a1              MOV      r9,r4
000040  f88d4000          STRB     r4,[sp,#0]
;;;350    	fRefresh = 1;	/* 1表示需要刷新LCD */
;;;351    	while (1)
;;;352    	{
;;;353    		bsp_Idle();
000044  f7fffffe          BL       bsp_Idle
;;;354    
;;;355    		if (fRefresh)
;;;356    		{
;;;357    			fRefresh = 0;
;;;358    
;;;359    			LCD_DrawEdit(&FormPad->Edit);
;;;360    		}
;;;361    
;;;362    		ucTouch = TOUCH_GetKey(&tpX, &tpY);	/* 读取触摸事件 */
;;;363    		if (ucTouch != TOUCH_NONE)
;;;364    		{
;;;365    			switch (ucTouch)
;;;366    			{
;;;367    				case TOUCH_DOWN:		/* 触笔按下事件 */				
;;;368    					if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->BtnF1, tpX, tpY))	/* 退格 */
;;;369    					{
;;;370    						if (ucCursor > 0)
;;;371    						{
;;;372    							ucCursor--;
;;;373    						}		
;;;374    						cEditBuf[ucCursor] = 0;	
;;;375    						fRefresh = 1;
;;;376    					
;;;377    					}
;;;378    					else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->BtnF2, tpX, tpY))
;;;379    					{
;;;380    						ucCursor = 0;		/* "清除"; */
;;;381    						cEditBuf[ucCursor] = 0;	
;;;382    						fRefresh = 1;
;;;383    					}
;;;384    					else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->BtnF3, tpX, tpY))
;;;385    					{
;;;386    						if (pad_layer == 1)
;;;387    						{								
;;;388    							fRefresh = 1;
;;;389    							FormPad->FontBtnNum.FrontColor = CL_BLACK;		/* 数字按钮用黑色字体 */
;;;390    							SetBtnText(PAD_ABC);
;;;391    							DispAllBtn();	/* 只刷新按钮 */							
;;;392    							pad_layer = 0;
;;;393    						}
;;;394    						else
;;;395    						{						
;;;396    							return 0;			/* "返回"; */
;;;397    						}
;;;398    					}				
;;;399    					else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->BtnF4, tpX, tpY))
;;;400    					{
;;;401    						;	/* "确认 ，等按钮释放时再确认修改 */
;;;402    					}				
;;;403    					else
;;;404    					{
;;;405    						ucKeyValue = 0xFF;
;;;406    						if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn0, tpX, tpY))
;;;407    						{	
;;;408    							ucKeyValue = '0';							
;;;409    						}				
;;;410    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn1, tpX, tpY))
;;;411    						{
;;;412    							ucKeyValue = '1';
;;;413    						}				
;;;414    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn2, tpX, tpY))
;;;415    						{
;;;416    							ucKeyValue = '2';
;;;417    						}
;;;418    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn3, tpX, tpY))
;;;419    						{
;;;420    							ucKeyValue = '3';
;;;421    						}
;;;422    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn4, tpX, tpY))
;;;423    						{
;;;424    							ucKeyValue = '4';
;;;425    						}
;;;426    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn5, tpX, tpY))
;;;427    						{
;;;428    							ucKeyValue = '5';
;;;429    						}	
;;;430    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn6, tpX, tpY))
;;;431    						{
;;;432    							ucKeyValue = '6';
;;;433    						}	
;;;434    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn7, tpX, tpY))
;;;435    						{
;;;436    							ucKeyValue = '7';
;;;437    						}
;;;438    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn8, tpX, tpY))
;;;439    						{
;;;440    							ucKeyValue = '8';
;;;441    						}	
;;;442    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->Btn9, tpX, tpY))
;;;443    						{
;;;444    							ucKeyValue = '9';
;;;445    						}	
;;;446    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->BtnA, tpX, tpY))
;;;447    						{
;;;448    							ucKeyValue = 'A';
;;;449    						}
;;;450    						/* 星号键修改为减号，便于数码管显示 ----- */
;;;451    						else if (LCD_ButtonTouchDown(&FormPad->BtnB, tpX, tpY))
;;;452    						{
;;;453    							ucKeyValue = 'B';
;;;454    						}
;;;455    							
;;;456    						if (_Mode == NUMPAD_STR)
;;;457    						{
;;;458    							if (ucKeyValue != 0xFF)
;;;459    							{
;;;460    								if (pad_layer == 0)
;;;461    								{
;;;462    									pad_layer = 1;			/* 进入2级键盘 */
;;;463    									pad_key = ucKeyValue;		
;;;464    			
;;;465    									if (ucKeyValue == 'A')
;;;466    									{
;;;467    										SetBtnText(PAD_ABCA);
;;;468    									}
;;;469    									else if (ucKeyValue == 'B')
;;;470    									{
;;;471    										SetBtnText(PAD_ABCB);
;;;472    									}
;;;473    									else  if (ucKeyValue >= '0' && ucKeyValue <= '9')
;;;474    									{
;;;475    										SetBtnText(pad_key - '0' + PAD_ABC0);	/* 纯数字键盘 */
;;;476    									}		
;;;477    									else
;;;478    									{
;;;479    										continue;
;;;480    									}
;;;481    									FormPad->FontBtnNum.FrontColor = CL_BLUE;		/* 数字按钮用蓝色字体 */
;;;482    									DispAllBtn();	/* 只刷新按钮 */
;;;483    									continue;
;;;484    								}
;;;485    								else		/* 在二级菜单 */
;;;486    								{
;;;487    									ucKeyValue = GetCharPad(pad_key, ucKeyValue);	/* 得到具体的字符 */									
;;;488    									pad_layer = 2;
;;;489    																	
;;;490    									LCD_DrawEdit(&FormPad->Edit);
;;;491    								}
;;;492    							}								
;;;493    						}
;;;494    						else
;;;495    						{
;;;496    							if (ucKeyValue == 'A')
;;;497    							{
;;;498    								ucKeyValue = '.';
;;;499    							}
;;;500    							else if (ucKeyValue == 'B')
;;;501    							{
;;;502    								ucKeyValue = '-';
;;;503    							}
;;;504    						}
;;;505    	
;;;506    						if (ucKeyValue != 0xFF)
;;;507    						{
;;;508    							if (ucCursor < INPUT_MAX_LEN)
;;;509    							{
;;;510    								cEditBuf[ucCursor++] = ucKeyValue;
;;;511    							}
;;;512    							else
;;;513    							{
;;;514    								cEditBuf[ucCursor - 1] = ucKeyValue;	/* 光标不移动，更新最后1个数字 */
;;;515    							}			
;;;516    							cEditBuf[ucCursor] = 0;	
;;;517    							fRefresh = 1;		
;;;518    						}
;;;519    					}
;;;520    					break;
;;;521    
;;;522    				case TOUCH_MOVE:		/* 触笔移动事件 */
;;;523    					break;
;;;524    
;;;525    				case TOUCH_RELEASE:		/* 触笔释放事件 */	
;;;526    					
;;;527    					if (_Mode == NUMPAD_STR)	/* 输入字符的分支 */				
;;;528    					{
;;;529    						if (pad_layer == 2)
;;;530    						{
;;;531    							pad_layer = 0;			/* 进入2级键盘 */
;;;532    					
;;;533    							FormPad->FontBtnNum.FrontColor = CL_BLACK;		/* 数字按钮用黑色字体 */
;;;534    							SetBtnText(PAD_ABC);
;;;535    							DispAllBtn();	/* 刷新按钮 */
;;;536    						}				
;;;537    					}
;;;538    				
;;;539    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn0, tpX, tpY);
;;;540    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn1, tpX, tpY);
;;;541    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn2, tpX, tpY);
;;;542    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn3, tpX, tpY);
;;;543    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn4, tpX, tpY);
;;;544    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn5, tpX, tpY);
;;;545    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn6, tpX, tpY);
;;;546    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn7, tpX, tpY);			
;;;547    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn8, tpX, tpY);
;;;548    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->Btn9, tpX, tpY);
;;;549    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->BtnA, tpX, tpY);
;;;550    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->BtnB, tpX, tpY);	
;;;551    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->BtnF1, tpX, tpY);
;;;552    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->BtnF2, tpX, tpY);
;;;553    					LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->BtnF3, tpX, tpY);		
;;;554    				
;;;555    					if (LCD_ButtonTouchRelease(&FormPad->BtnF4, tpX, tpY))	/* F4键 */
;;;556    					{
;;;557    						/* 点击了 ok 按钮 */
;;;558    						if (_Mode == NUMPAD_IP)			/* IP地址输入模式. 将IP地址的4个字段解码为4个整数 */
;;;559    						{
;;;560    							int32_t iIP;
;;;561    							uint8_t ucDotNum;	/* 小数点个数，用于判断数据合法 */
;;;562    							int16_t i;
;;;563    							NUMPAD_IP_T *pIP = (NUMPAD_IP_T *)_pOutParam;	/* IP地址输入模式 */
;;;564    
;;;565    							ucDotNum = 0;
;;;566    							for (i = 0; i < ucCursor; i++)
;;;567    							{
;;;568    								if (cEditBuf[i] == '.')
;;;569    								{
;;;570    									ucDotNum++;
;;;571    								}
;;;572    							}
;;;573    							if (ucDotNum != 3)	/* 必须包括3个小数点 */
;;;574    							{
;;;575    								DispInvlidInput();	/* 显示输入无效 */
;;;576    
;;;577    								fRefresh = 1;
;;;578    							}
;;;579    							else
;;;580    							{
;;;581    								/* 有3个小数点，开始解码IP地址 */
;;;582    								ucDotNum = 0;
;;;583    								iIP = 0;
;;;584    								for (i = 0; i < ucCursor; i++)
;;;585    								{
;;;586    									if ((cEditBuf[i] == '.') || (i == ucCursor - 1))
;;;587    									{
;;;588    										if (i == ucCursor - 1)
;;;589    										{
;;;590    											iIP = iIP * 10 + cEditBuf[i] - '0';
000048  f06f0a2f          MVN      r10,#0x2f
                  |L7.76|
00004c  6828              LDR      r0,[r5,#0]            ;359  ; FormPad
00004e  3030              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x30           ;359
000050  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawEdit
                  |L7.84|
000054  a90e              ADD      r1,sp,#0x38           ;362
000056  a80d              ADD      r0,sp,#0x34           ;362
000058  f7fffffe          BL       TOUCH_GetKey
00005c  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;363
                  |L7.94|
00005e  d071              BEQ      |L7.324|
000060  2801              CMP      r0,#1                 ;365
000062  d004              BEQ      |L7.110|
000064  2802              CMP      r0,#2                 ;365
000066  d0fa              BEQ      |L7.94|
000068  2803              CMP      r0,#3                 ;365
                  |L7.106|
00006a  d16b              BNE      |L7.324|
00006c  e162              B        |L7.820|
                  |L7.110|
00006e  f8bd0038          LDRH     r0,[sp,#0x38]         ;368
000072  b282              UXTH     r2,r0                 ;368

000080  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_ButtonTouchDown

                  |L7.178|

0000c0  f50070e6          ADD      r0,r0,#0x1cc          ;384

0000c8  b190              CBZ      r0,|L7.240|
0000ca  f1bb0f01          CMP      r11,#1                ;386
0000ce  d004              BEQ      |L7.218|
0000d0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0                 ;396
                  |L7.210|
;;;591    										}
;;;592    										if (iIP <= 255)
;;;593    										{
;;;594    											pIP->ip_buf[ucDotNum] = iIP;
;;;595    											ucDotNum++;
;;;596    
;;;597    											if (ucDotNum == 4)
;;;598    											{
;;;599    												return 1;	/* 返回正确结果 */
;;;600    											}
;;;601    											iIP = 0;
;;;602    										}
;;;603    										else
;;;604    										{
;;;605    											DispInvlidInput();	/* 显示输入无效 */
;;;606    											fRefresh = 1;
;;;607    											break;
;;;608    										}
;;;609    									}
;;;610    									else
;;;611    									{
;;;612    										iIP = iIP * 10 + cEditBuf[i] - '0';
;;;613    									}
;;;614    								}
;;;615    							}
;;;616    						}
;;;617    						else if (_Mode == NUMPAD_TEL)			/* 电话号码输入模式。 直接复制结果（小数点已提前禁止） */
;;;618    						{
;;;619    							if (ucCursor < 3)
;;;620    							{
;;;621    								DispInvlidInput();	/* 显示输入无效 */
;;;622    								fRefresh = 1;
;;;623    								break;
;;;624    							}
;;;625    
;;;626    							strcpy((char *)_pOutParam, cEditBuf);
;;;627    							return 1;	/* 返回正确结果 */
;;;628    						}
;;;629    						else if (_Mode == NUMPAD_INT)	/* NUMPAD_INT - 带小数点整数输入模式 【该分支还未调试】*/
;;;630    						{
;;;631    							int32_t iRet;
;;;632    							uint8_t ucDotNum;	/* 小数点个数，用于判断数据合法 */
;;;633    							int16_t i;
;;;634    							NUMPAD_INT_T *pInt = (NUMPAD_INT_T *)_pInParam;	/* 带小数点整数输入模式 */
;;;635    
;;;636    							ucDotNum = 0;
;;;637    							for (i = 0; i < ucCursor; i++)
;;;638    							{
;;;639    								if (cEditBuf[i] == '.')
;;;640    								{
;;;641    									ucDotNum++;
;;;642    								}
;;;643    							}
;;;644    							if (ucDotNum > 1)
;;;645    							{
;;;646    								/* 小数点个数大于1 */
;;;647    								iRet = -1;
;;;648    							}
;;;649    							else if (ucDotNum == 1)	/* 1个小数点 */
;;;650    							{
;;;651    								int32_t iDotValue;
;;;652    								int32_t iMult;
;;;653    
;;;654    								/* 先处理小数点前面的数字 */
;;;655    								iRet = 0;
;;;656    								for (i = 0; i <  ucCursor; i++)
;;;657    								{
;;;658    									if (cEditBuf[i] == '.')
;;;659    									{
;;;660    										break;
;;;661    									}
;;;662    									iRet *= 10;
;;;663    									iRet += cEditBuf[i] - '0';
;;;664    								}
;;;665    								iRet *= 1000;
;;;666    
;;;667    								/* 再处理小数点后面的数字 */
;;;668    								iDotValue = 0;
;;;669    								iMult = 100;
;;;670    								i++;
;;;671    								for ( ; i <  ucCursor; i++)
;;;672    								{
;;;673    									iDotValue += iMult * (cEditBuf[i] - '0');
;;;674    									iMult /= 10;
;;;675    								}
;;;676    
;;;677    								iRet += iDotValue;
;;;678    							}
;;;679    							else
;;;680    							{
;;;681    								/* 全部整数 */
;;;682    								iRet = 0;
;;;683    								for (i = 0; i <  ucCursor; i++)
;;;684    								{
;;;685    									iRet *= 10;
;;;686    									iRet += cEditBuf[i] - '0';
;;;687    								}
;;;688    							}
;;;689    
;;;690    							if ((ucCursor == 0) || (iRet < pInt->Min) || (iRet > pInt->Max ))
;;;691    							{
;;;692    								DispInvlidInput();	/* 显示输入无效 */
;;;693    
;;;694    								DispFormPad();	/* 重刷界面 */
;;;695    								fRefresh = 1;
;;;696    							}
;;;697    							else
;;;698    							{
;;;699    								strcpy((char *)_pOutParam, cEditBuf);
;;;700    								return 1;	/* 返回有效输入 */
;;;701    							}
;;;702    						}
;;;703    						else if (_Mode == NUMPAD_STR)	/* 输入字符的分支 */
;;;704    						{
;;;705    							uint8_t len = *(uint8_t *)_pInParam;								
;;;706    							
;;;707    							/* 对字符串长度进行限制 */
;;;708    							if (ucCursor > len)
;;;709    							{
;;;710    								DispInvlidInput();	/* 显示输入无效 */
;;;711    								DispFormPad();	/* 重刷界面 */
;;;712    								fRefresh = 1;
;;;713    								break;
;;;714    							}
;;;715    							strcpy((char *)_pOutParam, cEditBuf);							
;;;716    							return 1;	/* 返回正确结果 */							
;;;717    						}
;;;718    					}
;;;719    					break;
;;;720    			}
;;;721    		}
;;;722    	}
;;;723    }

                  |L7.218|

                          AREA ||i.SetBtnText||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  SetBtnText PROC
;;;865    */
;;;866    static void SetBtnText(uint8_t _mode)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;867    {	
;;;868    	if (_mode == PAD_DIGIT)		/* 纯数字 */
;;;869    	{
;;;870    		FormPad->Btn0.pCaption = "0";
000002  4c53              LDR      r4,|L8.336|
000004  0001              MOVS     r1,r0                 ;867
000006  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]            ;867
000008  d067              BEQ      |L8.218|
;;;871    		FormPad->Btn1.pCaption = "1";
;;;872    		FormPad->Btn2.pCaption = "2";
;;;873    		FormPad->Btn3.pCaption = "3";
;;;874    		FormPad->Btn4.pCaption = "4";
;;;875    		FormPad->Btn5.pCaption = "5";
;;;876    		FormPad->Btn6.pCaption = "6";
;;;877    		FormPad->Btn7.pCaption = "7";
;;;878    		FormPad->Btn8.pCaption = "8";
;;;879    		FormPad->Btn9.pCaption = "9";
;;;880    		FormPad->BtnA.pCaption = ".";
;;;881    		FormPad->BtnB.pCaption = "-";		
;;;882    	}
;;;883    	else if (_mode == PAD_ABC)	/* 数字和字符混合 */
00000a  2902              CMP      r1,#2
00000c  d07f              BEQ      |L8.270|
00000e  1ec9              SUBS     r1,r1,#3
;;;884    	{
;;;885    		FormPad->Btn0.pCaption = "0 符号";
;;;886    		FormPad->Btn1.pCaption = "1 数字";
;;;887    		FormPad->Btn2.pCaption = "2 abc";
;;;888    		FormPad->Btn3.pCaption = "3 def";
;;;889    		FormPad->Btn4.pCaption = "4 ghi";
;;;890    		FormPad->Btn5.pCaption = "5 jkl";
;;;891    		FormPad->Btn6.pCaption = "6 mno";
;;;892    		FormPad->Btn7.pCaption = "7 pqrs";
;;;893    		FormPad->Btn8.pCaption = "8 tuv";
;;;894    		FormPad->Btn9.pCaption = "9 wxyz";
;;;895    		FormPad->BtnA.pCaption = ".";
;;;896    		FormPad->BtnB.pCaption = "-";		
;;;897    	}
;;;898    	else if (_mode >= PAD_ABC0 && _mode <= PAD_ABCB)	/* 数字和字符混合 0 按下后的二级键盘 */
000010  290b              CMP      r1,#0xb
000012  d87b              BHI      |L8.268|
;;;899    	{
;;;900    		uint8_t index1;
;;;901    		
;;;902    		index1 = _mode - PAD_ABC0;
000014  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
;;;903    		
;;;904    		FormPad->Btn0.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12];
000016  eb010241          ADD      r2,r1,r1,LSL #1
00001a  1d21              ADDS     r1,r4,#4
00001c  eb011102          ADD      r1,r1,r2,LSL #4
000020  680a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0]
;;;905    		FormPad->Btn1.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 1];
000022  f8c02164          STR      r2,[r0,#0x164]
000026  684a              LDR      r2,[r1,#4]
000028  f8402f8c          STR      r2,[r0,#0x8c]!
;;;906    		FormPad->Btn2.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 2];
00002c  688a              LDR      r2,[r1,#8]
;;;907    		FormPad->Btn3.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 3];
00002e  6182              STR      r2,[r0,#0x18]
000030  68ca              LDR      r2,[r1,#0xc]
;;;908    		FormPad->Btn4.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 4];
000032  6302              STR      r2,[r0,#0x30]
000034  690a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x10]
;;;909    		FormPad->Btn5.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 5];
000036  6482              STR      r2,[r0,#0x48]
000038  694a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x14]
;;;910    		FormPad->Btn6.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 6];
00003a  6602              STR      r2,[r0,#0x60]
00003c  698a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x18]
;;;911    		FormPad->Btn7.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 7];
00003e  6782              STR      r2,[r0,#0x78]
000040  69ca              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x1c]
;;;912    		FormPad->Btn8.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 8];
000042  f8c02090          STR      r2,[r0,#0x90]
000046  6a0a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x20]
;;;913    		FormPad->Btn9.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 9];
000048  f8c020a8          STR      r2,[r0,#0xa8]
00004c  6a4a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x24]
;;;914    		FormPad->BtnA.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 10];
00004e  f8c020c0          STR      r2,[r0,#0xc0]
000052  6a8a              LDR      r2,[r1,#0x28]
;;;915    		FormPad->BtnB.pCaption = (char *)g_key_tab[index1 * 12 + 11];
000054  f8c020f0          STR      r2,[r0,#0xf0]
000058  6ac9              LDR      r1,[r1,#0x2c]
00005a  f8c01108          STR      r1,[r0,#0x108]
00005e  30c8              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xc8
;;;916    		
;;;917    		/* 只显示数字部分 */
;;;918    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn0);	
000060  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;919    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn1);
000064  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000066  307c              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x7c
000068  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;920    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn2);
00006c  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
00006e  3094              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x94
000070  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;921    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn3);
000074  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000076  30ac              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xac
000078  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;922    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn4);
00007c  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
00007e  30c4              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xc4
000080  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;923    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn5);
000084  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000086  30dc              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xdc
000088  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;924    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn6);
00008c  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
00008e  30f4              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xf4
000090  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;925    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn5);
000094  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
000096  30dc              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xdc
000098  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;926    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn6);
00009c  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
00009e  30f4              ADDS     r0,r0,#0xf4
0000a0  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;927    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn7);
0000a4  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0000a6  f5007086          ADD      r0,r0,#0x10c
0000aa  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;928    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn8);
0000ae  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0000b0  f5007092          ADD      r0,r0,#0x124
0000b4  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;929    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->Btn9);
0000b8  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0000ba  f500709e          ADD      r0,r0,#0x13c
0000be  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;930    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->BtnA);
0000c2  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0000c4  f50070b6          ADD      r0,r0,#0x16c
0000c8  f7fffffe          BL       LCD_DrawButton
;;;931    		LCD_DrawButton(&FormPad->BtnB);						
0000cc  6820              LDR      r0,[r4,#0]  ; FormPad
0000ce  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
0000d2  f50070c2          ADD      r0,r0,#0x184
0000d6  f7ffbffe          B.W      LCD_DrawButton
                  |L8.218|
0000da  a11e              ADR      r1,|L8.340|
0000dc  f8c01164          STR      r1,[r0,#0x164]        ;871
0000e0  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.344|
0000e2  f8401f8c          STR      r1,[r0,#0x8c]!        ;871
0000e6  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.348|
0000e8  6181              STR      r1,[r0,#0x18]         ;873
0000ea  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.352|
0000ec  6301              STR      r1,[r0,#0x30]         ;874
0000ee  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.356|
0000f0  6481              STR      r1,[r0,#0x48]         ;875
0000f2  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.360|
0000f4  6601              STR      r1,[r0,#0x60]         ;876
0000f6  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.364|
0000f8  6781              STR      r1,[r0,#0x78]         ;877
0000fa  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.368|
0000fc  f8c01090          STR      r1,[r0,#0x90]         ;878
000100  a11c              ADR      r1,|L8.372|
000102  f8c010a8          STR      r1,[r0,#0xa8]         ;879
000106  a11c              ADR      r1,|L8.376|
000108  e018              B        |L8.316|
00010a  e000              B        |L8.270|
                  |L8.268|
00010c  e01e              B        |L8.332|
                  |L8.270|
00010e  a11b              ADR      r1,|L8.380|
000110  f8c01164          STR      r1,[r0,#0x164]        ;886
000114  a11b              ADR      r1,|L8.388|
000116  f8401f8c          STR      r1,[r0,#0x8c]!        ;886
00011a  a11c              ADR      r1,|L8.396|
00011c  6181              STR      r1,[r0,#0x18]         ;888
00011e  a11d              ADR      r1,|L8.404|
000120  6301              STR      r1,[r0,#0x30]         ;889
000122  a11e              ADR      r1,|L8.412|
000124  6481              STR      r1,[r0,#0x48]         ;890
000126  a11f              ADR      r1,|L8.420|
000128  6601              STR      r1,[r0,#0x60]         ;891
00012a  a120              ADR      r1,|L8.428|
00012c  6781              STR      r1,[r0,#0x78]         ;892
00012e  a121              ADR      r1,|L8.436|
000130  f8c01090          STR      r1,[r0,#0x90]         ;893

000136  f8c010a8          STR      r1,[r0,#0xa8]         ;894
00013a  a122              ADR      r1,|L8.452|
                  |L8.316|
00013c  f8c010c0          STR      r1,[r0,#0xc0]         ;880
000140  a122              ADR      r1,|L8.460|
000142  f8c010f0          STR      r1,[r0,#0xf0]         ;881
000146  a122              ADR      r1,|L8.464|
000148  f8c01108          STR      r1,[r0,#0x108]        ;881
                  |L8.332|
;;;932    	}
;;;933    }
00014c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;934    
                          ENDP

00014e  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L8.336|
                          DCD      ||.data||
